headline: Does Verizon’s 5G Expansion Signal a Mispriced Opportunity Around $40 in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Verizon Communications at around $40 is quietly offering better value than the market gives it credit for right now, you are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack. After a 2.4% gain over the last week, Verizon is up 1.7% year to date and 8.6% over the past year, but still down 6.5% across five years. This mix hints at shifting sentiment and potentially improving expectations. Recently, headlines have focused on Verizon's continued 5G network...

headline: Kodiak AI and Verizon Business transform trucking with autonomous technology and IoT connectivity
summary: Verizon connectivity is now powering autonomous 18 wheelers What you need to know: Kodiak AI offers 24/7 autonomous driver as a service capability using its AI-powered virtual driver in long-haul trucking, industrial trucking, and defense applications Verizon is providing 5G telematics and ThingSpace IoT management solutions to help enable Kodiak’s operating model and manage massive amounts of data generated from its driverless trucksWatch the video to see how it works. headline: LUMN Surges 26% in the Past Year: Can It Sustain the Momentum in 2026?
summary: LUMN's shares are up nearly 25.9% in a year as its AI-driven PCF deals, NaaS growth and balance sheet repair fuel a high-stakes turnaround.

headline: Scotiabank Upgrades AST SpaceMobile (ASTS), Citing Improved Valuation After 50% Market Cap Pullback
summary: AST SpaceMobile Inc. (NASDAQ:ASTS) is one of the best Reddit stocks to invest in right now. On November 24, Scotiabank upgraded AST SpaceMobile to Sector Perform from Underperform, with an unchanged price target of $45.60. Scotiabank is now recommending the stock based on its improved valuation, which came after the company’s market capitalization halved over […]
